title: Iron pickaxe

properties.value: The iron pickaxe is a pickaxe stronger than the bronze pickaxe. It can be used in combat or to mine rocks. As with all pickaxes, players cannot smith an iron pickaxe.

The iron pickaxe is a pickaxe stronger than the bronze pickaxe. It can be used in combat or to mine rocks. As with all pickaxes, players cannot smith an iron pickaxe.

 Attack bonuses
+5-2+3+0+0
 Defence bonuses
+0+1+0+0+0

[[File:Iron pickaxe detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''iron pickaxe''' is a pickaxe stronger than the [[bronze pickaxe]]. It can be used in combat or to [[mining|mine]] rocks. As with all pickaxes, players cannot [[smithing|smith]] an iron pickaxe.
